comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Install q4e plugin (to properly setup workspace): http://code.google.com/p/q4e/wiki/Installation
2. Checkout Apache Cocoon from http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/cocoon/trunk/ at revision 566087
3. Import all projects of Cocoon by choosing File -> Import -> Maven 2 Project and pointing at root directory of checked out Cocoon's sources
4. Open org.apache.cocoon.template.expression.JXTExpression class from cocoon-template-impl project and try to pull up some methods of this class.

More information:
I've successfully reproduced this problem both on openSuse and Windows machines. I've tried to isolate problem out of Cocoon code but failed miserably. For simple projects pull up works just fine.

I attach full stacktrace:
